}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *'''Foxconn U40H039.00''' NGFF, 802.11a/b/g/n/ac + BT 4.1 :[[Dell Wireless 1830 (DW1830)]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM43602 :BT: [[Broadcom]] BCM20703A1 (DW1830 Bluetooth 4.1 LE)
===Specifications=== [[Broadcom BCM943602BAED]] NGFF (key A+E) :802.11a/b/g/n/ac + BT 4.1, 3x3, 2.4/5GHz :[http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s817141 ''Broadcom'' News Release for BCM43602] [[Broadcom]] BCM43602 Vendor ID: 0x14e4, DeviceID: 0x43ba *BCM43602 14e4:43ba supported in 3.17+ [http://wireless.kernel.org/en/users/Drivers/brcm80211] *BCM43602 14e4:43bb 2.4 GHz device, supported in 3.19+ *BCM43602 14e4:43bc 5 GHz device, supported in 3.19+ :Broadcom BCM20703 (chipset support BT 4.1)
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.tonymacx86.com/network/104850-guide-airport-pcie-half-mini-v2-170.html#post1219509 ''BCM943602BAED'' on '''Tonymacx86''' forums] :[[Broadcom BCM943602BAED]] (Dell DW1830) :NGFF M.2 Key A+E, 14e4:43ba, 3x3:3 MIMO :Bluetooth: BCM20703A1 (BCM2045A0), 0a5c:6410 *[https://applelife.ru/threads/wi-fi-bluetooth-airdrop-handoff-i-instant-hotspot-v-os-x-10-10.42443/page-12#post-493447 On '''AppleLife''' forums] *[http://www.insanelymac.com/forum/user/332888-skvo/ On '''InsanelyMac''']
